product_overview: SEEA Web is a premium institutional website for SEEA, a company specializing in Career and Image Management tailored for professionals seeking strategic positioning and digital authority. The website offers a cinematic, engaging visual experience that reflects the quality and exclusivity of SEEA's services.
core_goals: Generate qualified leads through WhatsApp CTA conversions.
Communicate authority by maintaining average time on page above 2 minutes.
Showcase portfolio through featured project views.
Build trust via client testimonials engagement.
Deliver a premium first impression with cinematic animations.
Ensure smooth navigation with fluid transitions.
Support full responsiveness across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Optimize performance to meet Core Web Vitals standards.
key_features: Cinematic Hero Section with text reveal animations and video background.
Infinite scrolling marquee displaying strategic keywords.
Detailed Services Section presenting SEEA's five ecosystem pillars.
3D Carousel showcasing featured projects with flip effects.
Looping image gallery with animated grid presentation.
About Section telling SEEA's story and founder's vision.
Client Testimonials integrated with Google Reviews (Trustindex).
FAQ section with expandable accordion cards and animations.
Overlay navigation menu with smooth fullscreen transitions.
Floating WhatsApp CTA button with pre-defined message.
Mega Footer with contact details, social links, and integrated Google Map.
Global smooth scrolling powered by Lenis.
Multiple animated UI components including text reveals and shimmering text effects.
Preloader screen with brand identity animation for initial loading.
user_flow_summary: User lands on a cinematic hero section with engaging text animations and video background.
User scrolls through marquee keywords showcasing core values.
User explores detailed services explaining SEEA’s five pillars.
User views featured project carousel highlighting portfolio quality.
User navigates the looping gallery demonstrating visual quality.
User reads about SEEA's history and company vision.
User reviews client testimonials to build trust.
User accesses FAQ section to clarify common questions with expandable answers.
User engages with floating WhatsApp CTA button to initiate contact.
User navigates through overlay menu to explore website sections.
User reaches footer containing contact info, social connections, and integrated map.
validation_criteria: All sections render correctly with animations and responsiveness on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
WhatsApp CTA floating button triggers correct pre-defined message and link.
Portfolio carousels and galleries scroll smoothly with 3D and loop animations.
SEO metadata configured and present in page headers with correct titles and descriptions.
Performance metrics meet Lighthouse scores above 90 and Core Web Vitals thresholds (FCP < 1.5s, LCP < 2.5s, CLS < 0.1).
Testimonials integrate properly with Trustindex Google Reviews widget.
FAQ accordions expand and collapse with smooth animations on user interaction.
Navigation overlay menu opens and closes with fluid transitions and accessibility.
Google Maps iframe in footer loads correctly and displays the location.
Preloader animates correctly during page load and disappears after load completes.
